transportAdvice: Antigua's compact colonial center is highly walkable, with most major attractions, restaurants, and hotels within easy reach on foot. Tuk-tuks and taxis are widely available for trips beyond the center or to nearby villages, and chicken buses connect Antigua to surrounding towns at very low cost.
